parameters: Text =    This is a beta. Some things will be subject to ch…
MetaGamesGX, Galzo, Team Solemn Circus, NyxTheBranded,
The land of the Abyss sits isolated, free from the whims of
the rest of the world, and free to brew whatever it pleases.
As a result of this, the nation of Dogmatika was able to spread
their influence with little contest. Located in the far north
and led by their leader, Dogmatika Maximus, Dogmatika is a politi
-cal superpower, striking down whatever they please under
Through the powerful holy relic known as the Dogmatika Nexus
and administered by Maximus, the followers of Dogmatika are
granted special power in the form of their Brands allowing them
to perform miracles and punish their enemies.
The Saints of Dogmatika are too numerous to mention here,
but a handful in particular stand out.
First is Dogmatika Ecclesia. A ward of the Church since childhood,
Ecclesia stands as a testament to doing good by those around you.
That, combined with her pure personality and devotion to the
faith earned her the golden Brand plastered on her forehead.
Lastly is Dogmatika Fleurdelis. The Knight Commander of
she wields not one, not two, not three,
but four Brands scattered across her limbs,
granting her the immense power to wield three of
Dogmatika's holy relics: the Sword, the Shield, and the Armor.
she stands as the moral authority of the entire nation.

parameters.text:
Our journey begins in the land of the abyss. A divided world consisting of several factions spread across this vast world. One of those are the people of a land ruled by god.
In the far north of the continent we find ourselves in the Dogmatika Nation
A empire of those faithful to the leadership of the Dogmatika Church

parameters: Text = Our journey begins in the land of the abyss. A divid…

parameters.text:
Standing on top of this church is Maximus. The pope and leader of the dogmatika.
According to the laws of the dogmatika, he is a vessel of god who rules over the nation with his 666 laws. His magnificence bestows the Brand onto those who are faithful to the dogmatika.

parameters: Text = Standing on top of this church is Maximus. The pope …

parameters.text:
The Dogmatika Nexus. A statue said to be given to the dogmatika by their god for worship.
No one aside from Maximus knows of its true purpose.

parameters: Text = The Dogmatika Nexus. A statue said to be given to th…

parameters.text:
Protecting the leader of the nation, are the Ashiyan. Skilled warriors in both physical and magical combat. These proud guardians of the dogmatika will
serve the church with absolute loyalty.

parameters: Text = Protecting the leader of the nation, are the Ashiyan…

parameters.text:
In this nation, dictated by the laws of the church. We follow the tale of a young girl whose future was set by the church to become the 666th saint of Dogmatika. 
However, her destiny will be steered into another direction by the arrival of a special person and the unveiling of the truth.
